author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

Previous tested showed that some groups of modules use their own memory caching which led to deallocations at end of event being assigned to the wrong module (as they happen to have used that address during the event as well but was later deallocated by a different module). Looking for module matches in reverse order of module completion helps with proper assignment.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles. Quick hand checks shows the change is working.
title: Handle case where modules share memory in ModuleEventAllocMonitor
